toolbox

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • toolbox.Image

  • public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class for loading images from file using the STBI library.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Image

        public Image(@NotNull
             java.lang.String path)
        Initializes a new Image by loading the specified image from file using the STBI library.
        Parameters:
        path - image's relative path (with extension like "res/textures/myTexture.png")
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file doesn't exists
        java.lang.RuntimeException - stbi can't load the image
